name: ChrisPirillo/quantum-reversi
description: Engage in a futuristic battle of wits with Quantum Reversi, a sci-fi themed strategy board game built with Three.js. Challenge the CPU or a friend in this modern take on a classic.

name: ChrisPirillo/binary-suns
description: Explore a vast, procedurally generated desert world under the light of two suns in this immersive 3D planet simulator. Fly across the landscape and collect mysterious orbs in a serene, endless environment.

name: ChrisPirillo/8bit-battle
description: Engage in classic 8-bit tank warfare! Play against the CPU in this retro-inspired, single-player combat game with dynamic, indestructible terrain.

name: ChrisPirillo/gravity-grid
description: Play Gravity Grid, a modern 3D version of the classic four-in-a-row game. Challenge the CPU or a friend in this visually rich strategy game with satisfying physics and sound.

name: ChrisPirillo/theremin
description: Experience an interactive, browser-based Theremin. Create haunting melodies and cosmic soundscapes with your mouse or touch. Features advanced controls for sound synthesis, effects, and a reactive visualizer.

name: ChrisPirillo/amulet-yandor
description: Embark on a perilous journey in 'The Amulet of Yandor', a classic roguelike adventure. Descend into the dungeon, find the legendary amulet, and return to the surface to save your village.

name: ChrisPirillo/pixel-dust
description: Create beautiful, interactive art from your images. Upload a photo and watch it deconstruct into a cloud of dynamic particles you can control and manipulate.

name: ChrisPirillo/terminal-vision
description: An interactive, real-time ASCII art converter that uses your webcam. Adjust resolution, brightness, color, and character sets to create unique terminal-style visuals.

name: ChrisPirillo/trench-wars
description: Engage in Trench Wars, a retro vector-style arcade game. Pilot your ship through treacherous trenches, destroy enemy TIE fighters, and defend your shields in this classic space shooter experience.

name: ChrisPirillo/sprite-sidescroller
description: Create, play, and share your own 8-bit side-scrolling platformer levels with this in-browser game generator and level editor. Build worlds with custom sprites and challenge your friends!

name: ChrisPirillo/sandtris
description: Play Sand Tetris (Sandtris), a unique block puzzle game where pieces crumble like sand. Optimize your strategy to clear masses and achieve high scores. Developed by Chris Pirillo.

name: ChrisPirillo/png-defaker
description: Fix pixel art and other images by removing fake transparent backgrounds (checkerboards, solid colors) easily. Adjust tolerance and shrink edges for perfect results.

name: ChrisPirillo/picturino
description: A powerful, browser-based image editor. Apply filters, adjust brightness, contrast, saturation, and more with this easy-to-use online tool.

name: ChrisPirillo/pattern-wallpaper
description: Explore and create unique generative art patterns for wallpapers and backgrounds with the Generative Pattern Wallpaper Studio. Customize complexity, style, and colors.

name: ChrisPirillo/life-dashboard
description: Discover fascinating statistics about your life based on your birth date. Explore metrics on physiology, daily habits, societal impact, technology usage, environmental footprint, and cosmic journey. Your Life Dashboard provides a unique perspective on your existence.

name: ChrisPirillo/droid-repair
description: Master math skills and repair droids in this engaging Jedi-themed educational game. Solve geometry, algebra, measurement, fractions, and data analysis problems.

name: ChrisPirillo/cybersweeper
description: Play Cybersweeper, a futuristic take on the classic minesweeper game. Challenge yourself with different game modes, unlock power-ups, and compete for the top score.

name: ChrisPirillo/css-art
description: Instantly convert any image into pure CSS pixel art. Upload a picture, adjust resolution and size, and generate clean, copy-pasteable CSS box-shadow code.

name: ChrisPirillo/circuit-breaker
description: Generate hyperrealistic PCB circuit board designs with customizable density, complexity, and colors. Explore intricate virtual electronics.

name: ChrisPirillo/ascii-attack
description: Play ASCII Attack, a retro style arcade shooter in your browser. Battle swarms of ASCII enemies, dodge their fire, and clear levels. Features full mobile touch controls.

name: ChrisPirillo/c64
description: Experience the classic Commodore 64 with the CHRISPIRILLO64 BASIC V27 retro simulator. Write and run BASIC programs, POKE memory, and relive the 8-bit era.

name: ChrisPirillo/glasshole
description: Manipulate dynamic, procedurally-generated glass elements over a cosmic background - or your own.

name: ChrisPirillo/cosmic-forge
description: Create stunning, unique, and high-resolution space wallpapers with the Cosmic Forge generator. Procedurally generate custom planets, nebulae, and starfields for your desktop or mobile background.

name: ChrisPirillo/1-bit-camera
description: Experience a retro 1-bit aesthetic with our real-time camera. Apply classic dithering effects like Halftone, Bayer, and Floyd-Steinberg to your webcam feed instantly. No installation required.

name: ChrisPirillo/instant-html
description: A simple, fast utility to paste any text or code and download it as a clean .html file. Instant HTML provides a neumorphic interface with syntax highlighting for quick conversions.

name: ChrisPirillo/infinite-rainstick
description: Experience the soothing sounds of an endless rainstick. Customize the gravity, seed count, and pitch to create your perfect ambient soundscape for relaxation, focus, or meditation.

name: ChrisPirillo/sand-art
description: Experience a relaxing, interactive sand art frame simulator. Create beautiful, calming landscapes with virtual sand and bubbles. Flip, shake, and paint your own unique art.

name: ChrisPirillo/clickboard
description: Clickboard is a local clipboard manager that helps you store and organize text and images directly in your browser. Securely manage your clipboard history without server interaction.

name: ChrisPirillo/weather
description: Get real-time, hyper-local weather forecasts with Weather or Not. Check temperature, humidity, wind, air quality, and a 7-day forecast with a stunning interface.

name: ChrisPirillo/vector-fury
description: Play Vector Fury, a fast-paced, full-viewport arcade game. Capture targets, use power-ups, and avoid hazards in this vector-style shooter. Now with lives and growing player!

name: ChrisPirillo/touch-grass
description: Experience a calming, interactive 3D simulation of grass blades blowing in the wind. Touch and interact with a virtual lawn, controlling blade length, wind, and more.

name: ChrisPirillo/tix
description: A self-contained app from tix.html.

name: ChrisPirillo/ticker
description: A self-contained app from ticker.html.

name: ChrisPirillo/textulator
description: ChrisPirillo's Textulator: A powerful and fast online tool for all your text manipulation needs. Convert case, count words, generate UUIDs, encode/decode, and much more.

name: ChrisPirillo/tenori-on
description: Experience Tenori-Online, an interactive web-based music sequencer inspired by the Yamaha Tenori-On. Create and play music with a 16x16 grid, multiple layers, and various synth sounds.

name: ChrisPirillo/tada-list
description: Organize your tasks and boost productivity with Ta-Da List, a fun and interactive Kanban-style to-do application. Get your daily dose of done!

name: ChrisPirillo/synthwave
description: A self-contained app from synthwave.html.

name: ChrisPirillo/star-wars-opening-crawl-maker
description: Create your own custom Star Wars opening crawl with scrolling text and a starry background. Relive the iconic movie intro with your own story! Perfect for fan films, presentations, or just for fun.

name: ChrisPirillo/rain
description: Experience a calming, realistic rain simulator with dynamic water droplets cascading down a window. Customize the rain's size, speed, and stickiness, or upload your own background.

name: ChrisPirillo/qr-code
description: Generate beautiful, custom QR codes with an elegant glassmorphic design. Supports text, URLs, Wi-Fi, vCards, events, and more.

name: ChrisPirillo/puzzlepalooza
description: A self-contained app from puzzlepalooza.html.

name: ChrisPirillo/polymaker
description: Visualize your 3D STL files with a wide range of PolyMaker filament colors. An interactive tool by @MakerDeck for 3D printing enthusiasts.

name: ChrisPirillo/pirillo95
description: Experience the nostalgia of Windows 95 with Pirillo95, a web-based retro OS simulator featuring classic apps and easter eggs. Created by Chris Pirillo.

name: ChrisPirillo/piddaddle
description: A self-contained app from piddaddle.html.

name: ChrisPirillo/online-meeting
description: Simulate being in an online video meeting with this interactive web app. Perfect for pretending to be busy or for a bit of fun. Features dynamic participants and a live chat.

name: ChrisPirillo/neon-cycles
description: Total immersion! Challenge cunning CPUs in Neon Cycles, a thrilling TRON-inspired lightcycle game with maximum glowing trails.

name: ChrisPirillo/monochromaze
description: Navigate a challenging monochromatic maze. Test your focus and reflexes in this minimalist puzzle adventure. Can you find the exit in MONOCHROMAZE?

name: ChrisPirillo/mathimation
description: Explore Mathimation, a mesmerizing generative art application that creates unique, complex mathematical animations in real-time. Control the patterns, or let new ones emerge endlessly. Created by Chris Pirillo.

name: ChrisPirillo/makerdeck-stl
description: Interactive 3D STL model viewer with highly randomized light movements, on-demand color randomization, a twinkling starfield, extensive customization, and a demo mode.

name: ChrisPirillo/makerdeck-flappament
description: Fly your 3D model through a gauntlet of 3D printer nozzles in MakerDeck Flappament, a challenging arcade game by MakerDeck! How high can you score?
